data.title: How to Start Business
data.description: Learn the basics of starting your online business from scratch with our easy-to-follow video series. Get actionable tips to launch with confidence!

data.title: 0 to 1 lakh | Day 1
data.description: Discover industry-tested strategies to earn your first lakh online. Start small, scale smart, and turn ideas into profit.

data.title: 0 to 50 lakh | Part 1
data.description: Learn how to scale your business to generate 50 lakh in revenue. This detailed series is packed with expert guidance and proven methods.

data.question: What does actually Online Tech Academy do?
data.answer: We're helping Growth Stage Entrepreneurs to get their Freedom of Life by providing True & Proven Guidelines.

data.question: Can I be a member of your team?
data.answer: Yes, you can join the team by following our recruitment process.

data.question: Is Online Tech Academy a Marketing or Consultancy Agency?
data.answer: Online Tech Academy provides consultancy and support for marketing your business effectively.

data.question: Does OTA have any courses?
data.answer: Yes, we offer several courses for entrepreneurs and business owners.

data.question: What guarantees or results do you offer?
data.answer: We ensure proven methods to grow your business effectively.

network.subHeadingPartOne: Be part of a dynamic community of
network.subHeadingPartTwo: who are reshaping their futures. Connect, collaborate, and grow together.
network.text: Our networking meetups are designed to inspire and empower. From exclusive Gold Member events to large-scale gatherings, every OTA meetup is an opportunity to learn from industry leaders, share insights, and expand your network. Whether you're looking for guidance or collaboration, you'll find it here.

discover.text: Our team is dedicated to fostering innovation, collaboration, and the success of every member in our community.
discover.footerText: Join a passionate team dedicated to shaping the future of entrepreneurship. At OTA, we believe in creating opportunities, driving innovation, and fostering a collaborative culture. Together, we’re making an impact—one business at a time.

otaWork.heading: Whom we work with!
otaWork.subHeading: At OTA, we're here to guide dreamers, doers, and achievers. Whether you're just starting out or looking to scale your business, our programs are built to meet you where you are and take you where you want to go.

otaWork.textTwo: Seeking strategies to scale and grow profitably.
otaWork.textThree: They seek independence through online entrepreneurship.

privacyPolicy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.textPartTwo: we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data when you visit our website or use our services.
privacyPolicy.partOneTextOne: Personal Information: Name, email, phone number, payment details (for paid services).
privacyPolicy.partOneTextTwo: Non-Personal Information: Browser type, device information, and website usage analytics.
privacyPolicy.partOneTextThree: Community Interactions: Comments, forum posts, and engagement in OTA events.
privacyPolicy.partTwoTextOne: To provide and improve our services.
privacyPolicy.partTwoTextTwo: To send updates, newsletters, and promotional offers (only with user consent).
privacyPolicy.partTwoTextThree: To enhance customer support and respond to inquiries.
privacyPolicy.partTwoTextFour: To maintain security and prevent fraudulent activities.
privacyPolicy.partThreeTextOne: OTA ensures strong security measures to protect user data from unauthorized access.
privacyPolicy.partThreeTextTwo: Payment details are encrypted and handled securely through third-party payment providers.
privacyPolicy.partThreeTextThree: Users can request data deletion or modification by contacting support.
privacyPolicy.partFourTextOne: We do not sell or trade user data.
privacyPolicy.partFourTextTwo: Information may be shared with trusted third-party service providers only for essential services (e.g., payment processing, analytics).
privacyPolicy.partFourTextThree: Legal requirements may require us to disclose information when necessary.
privacyPolicy.partFiveTextOne: OTA uses cookies to improve user experience and analyze website traffic.
privacyPolicy.partFiveTextTwo: Users can manage cookie preferences through their browser settings.
privacyPolicy.partSixTextOne: Users can opt out of promotional communications.
privacyPolicy.partSixTextTwo: Request access to personal data or ask for modifications or deletion.
privacyPolicy.partSixTextThree: Disable cookies via browser settings for enhanced privacy.
privacyPolicy.partSevenTextOne: OTA may update this Privacy Policy as needed.
privacyPolicy.partSevenTextTwo: Continued use of our platform after changes means acceptance of the new terms.
privacyPolicy.partEightTextOne: For any questions regarding this policy, contact us at
